Hi,

This is the other half of the ANJI team.

I believe if you just set th=
e following two properties the following ways:

initial.topology.fully.conn=
ected=3Dfalse
initial.topology.num.hidden.neurons=3D0

That should start wi=
th an intial topology with only input and output
neurons, with no connectio=
ns.  Philip can correct me if that isn't
right, but go ahead and give it a =
try. :)

Derek
